about.heading: About us
about.description:
Oasis mission is to provide the best and most trusted entry point to deploy your capital. We are building Oasis.app to let our users benefit from all of the potential in DeFi.

 Our team is made of passionate thinkers and builders.

careers.heading: Open Roles
careers.intro: We believe in talent. Join us to build the next generation of DeFi.
careers.no-open-positions: There are currently no roles available at this time, but we are always looking for the best talents to join us.
careers.no-positions-you-like: You haven't found something that you like? Show us your interest, we are always looking for the best talents to join us!
